Definition.name: GetModel_local

Documentation.content: Internal function to determine values for the model co-efficients and selected stats from building the model.
Documentation.firstline: Internal function to determine values for the model co-efficients and selected stats from building the model

param.name: max_iter
param.desc: maximum number of iterations to try

param.name: epsilon
param.desc: the minimum change in the Beta value estimate to continue

param.name: ridge
param.desc: a value to populate a diagonal matrix that is added to a matrix help assure that the matrix is invertible.

Documentation.return: coefficient matrix plus model building stats

Signature.name: GetModel_local
Signature.param: (DATASET(NumericField) independents, DATASET(DiscreteField) dependents, UNSIGNED2 max_iter=200, REAL8 epsilon=Constants.default_epsilon, REAL8 ridge=Constants.default_ridge)

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Model) GetModel_local(DATASET(NumericField) independents, DATASET(DiscreteField) dependents, UNSIGNED2 max_iter=200, REAL8 epsilon=Constants.default_epsilon, REAL8 ridge=Constants.default_ridge)
